item.title: EP 665 - The Petrifier
item.itunes:title: The Petrifier
item.description:
Today we join a Chinese boy band, find three men standing on our car, and then we get petrified by Girolamo!

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

https://imgur.com/gallery/aPN1Fnw

 

Links:

https://www.odditycentral.com/news/russian-man-trapped-on-chinese-reality-show-finally-gets-voted-out.html

https://www.scmp.com/lifestyle/entertainment/article/3130548/russian-model-wows-audiences-chinese-boy-band-show-he-says

Lelush's Question: Why Does Everyone Wants to Be the Center?
